synopsis: At 3:00 PM today, the center of Tropical Storm "ADA" {NOKAEN} was estimated based on all available data over the coastal waters of Bagamanoc, Catanduanes (14.2°N, 124.5°E) with maximum sustained winds of 85 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 105 km/h. It is moving North Northwestward at 10 km/h. Northeast Monsoon affecting Northern Luzon.
